title: go.blog: dead link on blog.golang.org
body:
by **fgergo**: 
(I am not sure whether I should report a dead link on go-nuts or here or nowhere.)

If I click the link Moustachio http://moustach-io.appspot.com/ in the blog post
http://blog.golang.org/gif-decoder-exercise-in-go-interfaces I get a 500 Server Error.

I don't know if there is any intention to keep this appengine example working or not,
but for completeness I report it.
